taxonomy.name: Violent Crimes
taxonomy.description: Content involving physical violence, assault, murder, or other violent criminal activities

taxonomy.name: Non-Violent Crimes
taxonomy.description: Content involving theft, fraud, drug trafficking, or other non-violent criminal activities

taxonomy.name: Sex-Related Crimes
taxonomy.description: Content involving sexual assault, harassment, or other sex-related criminal activities

taxonomy.name: Child Sexual Exploitation
taxonomy.description: Content involving sexual exploitation, abuse, or harm to minors

taxonomy.name: Defamation
taxonomy.description: Content that makes false statements damaging to someone's reputation

taxonomy.name: Specialized Advice
taxonomy.description: Content providing legal, medical, financial, or other specialized professional advice

taxonomy.name: Privacy
taxonomy.description: Content that violates personal privacy or contains sensitive personal information

taxonomy.name: Intellectual Property
taxonomy.description: Content that infringes on copyrights, trademarks, patents, or other intellectual property rights

taxonomy.name: Indiscriminate Weapons
taxonomy.description: Content involving weapons of mass destruction, biological weapons, or indiscriminate weapons

taxonomy.name: Hate
taxonomy.description: Content promoting hatred, discrimination, or violence against individuals or groups

taxonomy.name: Suicide & Self-Harm
taxonomy.description: Content promoting or providing instructions for suicide or self-harm

taxonomy.name: Sexual Content
taxonomy.description: Explicit sexual content, pornography, or sexually explicit material

taxonomy.name: Elections
taxonomy.description: Content attempting to influence elections, voting processes, or political outcomes
